content:
{"name": "Massachusetts SNAP Application", "alternate_name": "", "description": "Help get the food you need

1 out of 6 people in Massachusetts receive SNAP benefits.
Apply for SNAP in 20 minutes or less.

This application is about you, your household, your income, and your expenses. It should only take about 20 minutes.

You do not need a fixed address or phone number to apply for SNAP, but DTA does need a way to reach you to complete your online SNAP application. If you do not have an address we can send mail to, please call DTA Assistance Line at 877-382-2363 or go to your local DTA office.
If they apply to you, have these numbers handy!

* Birth dates
* Social Security Numbers
* Incomes
* Expenses", "email": "", "url": "https://dtaconnect.eohhs.mass.gov/", "status": "active", "address": {"address_1": "", "address_2": null, "city": "Boston", "state_province": "MA", "postal_code": "", "country": "US"}, "location": {"latitude": 42.3693901, "longitude": -71.0394754}, "phones": [{"number": "(877) 382-2363", "type": "voice"}]}
